name: Drain down and fill up of sprinkler system
Isolate sprinkler zones in alarm and De-isolate FIP & ASE
On completion of works check that there are no open ends and everything is plugged off ready for water.
Once system is full ensure everything has been put back to normal – ie; pumps, sprinklers, ASE & FIP all back online
Any further comments; ie, something stuck in alarm, any additional information.
